cs113.calendar.guiview
Class Search

java.lang.Object
  cs113.calendar.guiview.Search

public class Search
extends java.lang.Object

Represents the current state of the SearchComponent. A search can select for various things, each of which may or may not be present.

Author:
Owen Healy

matches

public boolean matches(Appointment app)
Test if an appointment matches this search.

Parameters:

Returns:
true if it matches, false if it does not.
